log.content: I would like you to create an svg image of a sunset through the mountains. Make sure the result is visible in index.html

function.name: create_file
function.arguments:
{"content":"<svg width="400" height="300">
  <defs>
    <linearGradient id="gradient1" x1="0%" y1="0%" x2="100%" y2="100%">
      <stop offset="0%" stop-color="#FF6F00" stop-opacity="0.9" />
      <stop offset="50%" stop-color="#FFD700" stop-opacity="0.7" />
      <stop offset="100%" stop-color="#FF6F00" stop-opacity="0.3" />
    </linearGradient>
  </defs>
  <rect width="400" height="300" fill="url(#gradient1)"/>
  <path d="M200,10 L35,290 L365,290 Z" fill="#87CEEB"/>
</svg>","file_name":"index.html"}
